what_it_is: A gentle, moisturising facial cleanser formulated to target makeup removal whilst leaving the skin feeling smooth and moisturised.
what_it_does: This formula incorporates Squalane, alongside other lipophilic esters that are gentle, moisturising, efficient in dissolving makeup and facial impurities and increasing the spreadability of the product. When rubbed between your palms for approximately 10-30 seconds, the product undergoes an important textural change from a balm-like consistency to a clear oil-like consistency. This allows the emulsifying sucrose esters in the formula to trap and blend the dissolved makeup and facial impurities with water for rinsing. Being non-comedogenic and soap-free, this formula is designed to be gentle enough for daily use, without over-drying the skin.

This winning combo gently removes makeup, dirt, and impurities.
what_it_does:
To adapt to your skin’s needs, Sephora Collection’s cleansing makeup remover wipes have been formulated with carefully chosen plant extracts to deliver the full benefits of fruit and plants:
- Coconut: Known for its high fatty acid content, coconut's hydrating properties are ideal for dry skin!
- Watermelon: Bursting with water, watermelon is known for its high concentration of sugar and proteins, which help lock in moisture.
- Aloe vera: Aloe vera is extremely resistant to heat. Its high sugar, protein, and amino acid content moisturizes skin and protects it from dehydration.

what_it_is: A water-free serum for gentle exfoliation and pore decongestion.
what_it_does: This serum offers salicylic acid in a squalane base formulated with the intent of reducing concerns of skin irritation. The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Anhydrous Solution is a water-free product formulated to exfoliate the skin and help decongest pores. Direct acids, specifically alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs) and beta hydroxy acids (BHAs), are renowned for their ability to support the natural shedding of dead skin. While AHAs aim to promote superficial exfoliation, Salicylic Acid (SA), a lipophilic BHA, is particularly effective at targeting oil within the pores that can lead to congestion. The Ordinary Salicylic Acid 2% Anhydrous Solution offers salicylic acid in a squalane base formulated with the intent of reducing concerns of skin irritation that can be associated with the use of SA.

Enzymes from natural origin, extracted from pomegranate, known for their skin exfoliating properties.
Bamboo stem powder from natural origin, also known for its exfoliating properties.

A fresh, melting micellar makeup remover gel with cornflower floral water 
The micellar makeup remover gel, made with cornflower floral water, is your best ally for gently removing eye and face makeup. Its fresh gel texture cleans skin better, making it feel soft and comfortable right away. Right from the first use, your skin will feel comfortable, soothed and more supple. 

A responsibly developed makeup remover for sensitive skin 
SEPHORA COLLECTION micellar makeup remover gel contains 91%  ingredients from natural origin. We chose to concentrate on formula effectiveness and star ingredients, which is why our micellar makeup remover gel is unscented. The formula gently removes makeup on all skin types, even sensitive skin. It can be used on sensitive areas on your face, like eyes and lips. 
All of our products are developed according to strict formulation criteria and are clinically proven to be suitable for all skin types. 
The packaging was designed to be eco-friendly: the bottle of this micellar makeup remover gel is made with 100% recycled plastic.

An effective yet nurturing cleansing alternative to traditional rinse-off cleansers, Micellar Cleansing Water effortlessly and effectively dissolves impurities and unclogs pores while balancing and hydrating skin. Unlike regular tap water, this extremely mild formula, which requires absolutely no rinsing, will not disturb the skin’s pH balance, making it a lifesaver for even the driest, most sensitive and acne-prone complexions. Infused with soothing Aloe Leaf Juice and skin-strengthening amino acids, plus collagen-bolstering Nordic Birch Sap, multitasking Micellar Cleansing Water hydrates as it cleanses and tones, eliminating the need for face wash, make-up remover and moisturiser. In one step, skin is purified, smoothed and instantly revitalised.

Every day, the skin is subjected to environmental damage like the fine particulate matter in polluted air, which builds up on skin, throws its pH out of balance, and clogs pores. To prevent skin from suffocating, Sephora Collection’s Anti-Pollution + Smoothing Gentle pH Balancing Toner moisturizes skin, smooths its texture, and helps pull out pollution particles while balancing the skin’s pH.
what_it_does:
Say goodbye to pollution: super-ingredients to protect your skin. Pollution has an impact on our skin. That’s why our face toner is formulated with 94% naturally derived ingredients, including an extract of chlorella, a type of micro-algae in a complex known for its pH-balancing action, and brown algae extracts known for their ability to undo damage caused by pollution. This fresh, lightweight, hydrating toner smooths and evens out skin texture, loosening impurities and pollution particles so they can be wiped away.

Purify your skin with a toner that works instantly: Anti-Pollution + Smoothing Gentle pH Balancing Toner purifies your skin from the very first time you use it, pulling out impurities and pollution particles. It restores your skin’s natural beauty and balance. Clinically proven tolerance ensures it is suitable for all skin types.

A bottle developed with the environment in mind: Our purifying toner is vegan, and on top of that, it comes in eco-designed packaging in keeping with Sephora Collection’s policy of reducing the use of plastic. The bottle is made of 100% recycled plastic (excluding cap and décor) and is made in France by a company that limits its use of energy.

what_it_is: A purifying, soothing and reparative toner that makes pores look smaller and skin look brighter.
what_it_does: This toner acts as a pivot between what you remove from the skin surface when you cleanse and what you replenish it with afterwards. The Face Vinegar contains Actibiome, a novel prebiotic that works to calm stressed skin and prevent it from further irritations alongside postbiotics that allow the skin’s beneficial bacteria to flourish. The second active is Hibiscus Vinegar. Extracted from the Hibiscus flower that’s native to Central America, it is rich in acetic acid, with astringent properties, to gently dislodge dirt and unhealthy bacteria. Another important ingredient is tannins, which has been found to regulate sebum. It is also full of antioxidants that help stop free radicals from attacking and degrading skin cells. Oxidative stress is reduced so the skin can remain protected from external ageing factors. The gentle exfoliating action of AHA (alpha hydroxy acid) stimulates cell renewal for a smoother, refined finish. It also helps minimise the appearance of blemish scarring.

pdt_name: C.E.O. Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream
unique_id: SUNDAY RILEY-C.E.O. Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream
what_it_is: A hydrating moisturizer that infuses skin with high-potency, advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate) to fight the first visible signs of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support.
what_it_does: C.E.O. C + E Protect and Repair Moisturizer infuses five per cent advanced, oxygen-stable tetrahexydecyl ascorbate (THD ascorbate) into the skin—the gold standard form of vitamin C. THD ascorbate is the newer, clinically-proven, oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, which penetrates better into the skin while being exceptionally stable against oxygenation. With 5 per cent THD ascorbate, this moisturizer is powerful at fighting the first visible signs of ageing and restoring vital skin radiance, while being uniquely suitable for those with sensitive skin, as THD ascorbate is significantly less irritating than other forms of vitamin C. Once in the skin, it helps boost youthful-looking skin texture and volume, in addition to providing photostable, antioxidant support. Blended with protective, anti-pollution expopolysaccharides and refining lime pearl extract, this formula visibly repairs the effects of ageing, environmental stress, and pollution-induced damage. It is rich yet never greasy, providing hydration and antioxidant protection to the skin for a visibly younger, softer, and healthier-looking complexion.

what_it_is: A matte moisturizing cream for combination to oily skin.
what_it_does:
Made with 90% natural-origin ingredients, Sephora Collection’s day cream with squalane is specially designed for combination to oily skin. It reduces excess sebum and limits shine without sacrificing hydration to give you smooth skin. It gives you a matte finish while intensely moisturizing your skin without leaving a greasy film.  It’s also a great makeup base. 

A cream with squalane that effectively creates a matte finish 
With 90% natural-origin ingredients, this mattifying day cream contains effective super ingredients: 
- Natural-origin squalane from olives is known for moisturizing. 
- Natural-origin hyaluronic acid, derived from wheat, is known to be a moisturizing ingredient. It helps skin to retain water and protects it from dehydration. 

A clinically proven matte moisturizing cream 
Made with 90% natural-origin ingredients, this matte moisturizing cream is non comedogenic and clinically proven to be suitable for all skin types. This product is fragrance-free because we wanted to concentrate on product effectiveness and star ingredients. 

A day cream for combination to oily skin developed using a responsible approach 
The tube for our matte moisturizing cream is made with 44% recycled plastic and can be recycled. As for the box, it’s made from cardboard produced from sustainably managed forests and printed with plant-based inks.

what_it_is: A moisturizer formulated with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E that hydrates your skin for up to 8 hours and protects your skin from environmental damage.
what_it_does:
This lightweight, unscented SEPHORA COLLECTION day cream gives your skin everything it needs to stay naturally radiant with 96% natural-origin ingredients and a cocktail of antioxidants. It acts as a shield to protect skin from environmental damage. Its ultra-light milky texture is easy to apply and makes it an excellent primer. 

Its highlights: 
- A long-lasting, moisturizing face cream that keeps working even after 8 hours 
- A face care product made without animal-derived raw materials 
- An unscented formula, concentrated on product efficacy and star ingredients 
- A moisturizing face cream with super ingredients 

This SEPHORA COLLECTION radiant face care product’s secret? 
A light day cream with a pair of effective ingredients that take care of your skin every day: 

Hyaluronic acid from natural origin. 
This active ingredient, extracted from wheat, is an effective moisturizing ingredient that protects the skin. It helps skin to retain water and protects it from dehydration.
Vitamin E from natural origin, extracted from sunflowers and known for its antioxidant properties. 

Packaging developed with a responsible approach. 
The tube is made with 44% recycled plastic. The cardboard comes from sustainably managed forests and is printed with plant-based inks.

what_it_does: Japanese White Peony Extract: Japanese White Peony is a special, pure white flower harvested in Niigata, Japan, that has been treasured for centuries. It helps strengthen the skin barrier function, providing a “seal” that enables the thinnest skin around the eye area to retain moisture for reduced dryness and sensitivity.  Silk Extract includes the two proteins that comprise silk, sericin and fibroin, that together closely parallel the amino acid structure of human skin. This complete protein provides a protective veil of hydration like a second skin without weighing it down, revealing a lustrous glow. The Silk Peony contains 30% Hadasei-3™, our signature trio of pure Japanese superfoods, double fermented to yield essential skin nutrients for visibly radiant eyes. Uji Green Tea is known to detoxify and help reduce premature signs of ageing, Okinawa mozuku algae is packed with polysaccharides essential for skin water retention and renewal, and protein-rich Akita rice nourishes and moisturises.

pdt_name: Essential Hydration Cream with Rose Geranium and Vitamin E
unique_id: ALPHA-H-Essential Hydration Cream with Rose Geranium and Vitamin E
what_it_is: An aromatic, soothing moisturiser formulated with a unique blend of essential oils, bio-active sea minerals and essential fatty acids to replenish and revitalise parched skin while aiding in moisture retention for longer lasting and more sustainable hydration
what_it_does: This soothing moisturiser does not contain actives or Glycolic Acid so it is perfect for even the most sensitive skins. It combines a range of soothing and healing ingredients to bring immediate relief and comfort to dry and irritated skins. It is great for those with broken capillaries, diffused redness, skin sensitivities and inflammation. It is also suitable to help calm rosacea, eczema and dermatitis-prone skins. Water is essential for cellular life, so a well-moisturised skin with properly functioning cells is both healthy and younger-looking. If the skin has been damaged or irritated, leaving its lipid barrier impaired, it cannot begin to heal until such time as the lipid barrier is repaired and moisture loss is stopped. Essential Hydration Cream can help to heal and return balance to the skin’s lipid barrier by nourishing and protecting dry and delicate skins. Arnica, Cypress, Malt and Solomon’s Seal combine in a powerful anti-redness complex which provides anti-inflammatory properties, whilst also strengthening the walls of the capillaries to diffuse redness in the skin. High in trace minerals, calcium, manganese, zinc and magnesium, Red Algae Extract contains highly concentrated micronutrients which help the skin to metabolise vitamins and activates the skin’s enzymatic processes. Rose Geranium adds not only a beautiful calming scent but also has anti-fungal properties.

what_it_is: An overnight leave-on treatment supercharged with award-winning adaptogen 2% MossCellTec, Oat Protein & ATP, Panthenol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8, and Niacinamide, that helps soothe and repair compromised and post-procedure skin.

Compromised skin craves instant comfort, accelerated skin regeneration, and uniformity. This powerful formula is made with a fusion of instantly acting and long-term reparative ingredients and acts like an all-in-one First Aid kit for your skin. It’s ideal to use before and after non-invasive procedures such as laser treatments, micro-needling, and chemical peels. On the first night you get an instant feeling of comfort and moisture as skin repair is accelerated. Panthenol and Palmitoyl Tripeptide-8 hydrate and plump, activating cells to accelerate recovery. By night 14 the skin barrier is rebuilt, and the epidermis is renewed. The longer you use this formula, the healthier and more resilient your skin will become.

This daily moisturiser contains Pomegranate Seed Oil to protect skin from oxidative damage and protect from cell degradation, New Zealand Pine Bark Extract (Enzogenol) to prevent photo-aging and promote cell renewal, and Mango Seed Butter to nourish and provide a silky matte finish. This moisturiser is great for all skin types and leaves skin with a soft-focus matte finish. It also has a slight pink-beige tint due to the inclusion of Enzogenol; this does not provide coverage but has a pore blurring effect and means it does not leave a white cast on skin like other SPFs can.

what_it_does: The Cream works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, redness, and uneven texture and features TFC8®, a complex of natural amino acids, high-grade vitamins and synthesised molecules naturally found in the skin, which guides key nutrients and powerful natural ingredients to cells, creating an optimal environment for renewal. Vitamin A helps to normalise the skin’s barrier properties and diminish the appearance of fine lines by improving regeneration and collagen stimulation. Vitamin C stimulates collagen production and brightens the skin. Vitamin B5 deeply moisturises, conditions and heals while Hydrolyzed Rice Protein soothes and calms, while improving hydration and smoothness.

what_it_is: A cream that releases a burst of pure hydration.
what_it_does: This anti-aging moisturiser transforms to release a burst of skin-improving nutrients, powerful Japanese botanicals, and refreshing hydration for clear, poreless skin that is perfectly prepped for makeup. In traditional Eastern medicine, Japanese Wild Rose is used to bring the body back into balance, improve circulation and even calm the spirit. The antioxidant-rich fruits of this fragrant blossom can balance skin and diminish the look of pores. Found on the cool hillsides of Japan, Japanese Leopard Lily has been prized for centuries. Used to decorate the streets of Kyoto’s geisha district during the Gion Festival, Japanese Leopard Lily has earned the name “the flower of Kyoto.” We’ve harnessed its special powers to help minimise excess oil production, calm problem skin, and promote turnover of the skin. Hadasei-3 Complex reveals soft, healthy-looking skin. Featuring Uji Green Tea (known to detoxify and help prevent signs of premature ageing), Okinawa Red Algae (rich in polysaccharides, essential for skin water retention and renewal), and Akita Rice (a nourishing moisturiser, rich in essential proteins).

what_it_is: A gel-cream moisturiser to wake up to juicy skin: nourished, renewed, glowing.

It also has clean, fresh scent inspired by lush tropical fruits and flowers.

pdt_name: C.E.O. Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream
unique_id: SUNDAY RILEY-C.E.O. Vitamin C Rich Hydration Cream
what_it_is: A hydrating moisturizer that infuses skin with high-potency, advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate) to fight the first visible signs of aging while providing powerful antioxidant support.
what_it_does: C.E.O. C + E Protect and Repair Moisturizer infuses five per cent advanced, oxygen-stable tetrahexydecyl ascorbate (THD ascorbate) into the skin—the gold standard form of vitamin C. THD ascorbate is the newer, clinically-proven, oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, which penetrates better into the skin while being exceptionally stable against oxygenation. With 5 per cent THD ascorbate, this moisturizer is powerful at fighting the first visible signs of ageing and restoring vital skin radiance, while being uniquely suitable for those with sensitive skin, as THD ascorbate is significantly less irritating than other forms of vitamin C. Once in the skin, it helps boost youthful-looking skin texture and volume, in addition to providing photostable, antioxidant support. Blended with protective, anti-pollution expopolysaccharides and refining lime pearl extract, this formula visibly repairs the effects of ageing, environmental stress, and pollution-induced damage. It is rich yet never greasy, providing hydration and antioxidant protection to the skin for a visibly younger, softer, and healthier-looking complexion.

what_it_is: A matte moisturizing cream for combination to oily skin.
what_it_does:
Made with 90% natural-origin ingredients, Sephora Collection’s day cream with squalane is specially designed for combination to oily skin. It reduces excess sebum and limits shine without sacrificing hydration to give you smooth skin. It gives you a matte finish while intensely moisturizing your skin without leaving a greasy film.  It’s also a great makeup base. 

A cream with squalane that effectively creates a matte finish 
With 90% natural-origin ingredients, this mattifying day cream contains effective super ingredients: 
- Natural-origin squalane from olives is known for moisturizing. 
- Natural-origin hyaluronic acid, derived from wheat, is known to be a moisturizing ingredient. It helps skin to retain water and protects it from dehydration. 

A clinically proven matte moisturizing cream 
Made with 90% natural-origin ingredients, this matte moisturizing cream is non comedogenic and clinically proven to be suitable for all skin types. This product is fragrance-free because we wanted to concentrate on product effectiveness and star ingredients. 

A day cream for combination to oily skin developed using a responsible approach 
The tube for our matte moisturizing cream is made with 44% recycled plastic and can be recycled. As for the box, it’s made from cardboard produced from sustainably managed forests and printed with plant-based inks.

A double gesture Ultra Glow Mask for a more radiant skin: a rinse-off or overnight sleeping face mask
Made with 95% ingredients from natural origin, SEPHORA COLLECTION’s unscented Ultra Glow Mask is your new go-to ally for more radiant skin & a refined skin texture. With a cocktail of 2% vitamin C and E from natural origin, this face mask makes skin more radiant, evens out the complexion and reduces the appearance of dark spots. This double gesture face mask is your daily go-to ally for a fresh, glowing complexion: 

    Use this vitamin C and E enriched mask twice a week - apply a thick layer on the face, leave the mask on for 15 mins then remove any excess with cotton pads; 
    Or use as an overnight sleeping mask every evening. 

Vitamin C and E enriched Ultra Glow Mask 
SEPHORA COLLECTION’s Ultra Glow Mask is made from super ingredients to meet your skin’s needs. Our face mask contains a cocktail of 2% vitamin C and E from natural origin, extracted from potatoes and sunflowers, known respectively to make skin glow and protect it from external aggressions.

what_it_is: A firming night cream to take care of your face with peptides, for firmer radiant skin.
what_it_does:
A firming night cream for smoother skin
Made with 95% ingredients from natural origin & unscented, this SEPHORA COLLECTION Firming Night Cream brings moisture, radiance and firmness to your skin, making it look younger. Right from the first application,  skin is smoother, nourished and visibly more beautiful. After using the Firming Night Cream for 28 days, skin will be firmer, wrinkles and fine lines will be visibly reduced and  skin will look younger. Try it! You won’t be able to do without it.

A firming night cream with peptides for firmer skin when you wake up
Our Firming Night Cream works against all signs of aging: dullness, tired and irregular complexion, wrinkles and fine lines appearance, and skin sagging. Its little extra? Peptides, the star ingredient of our firming night cream. They’re from natural origin and known for their firming effect.

A firming night cream for all skin types
Our Firming Night Cream is clinically proven and suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skins. We chose to concentrate on formula efficacy and star ingredients, which is why our firming night cream is unscented.

what_it_is: A cream that releases a burst of pure hydration.
what_it_does: This anti-aging moisturiser transforms to release a burst of skin-improving nutrients, powerful Japanese botanicals, and refreshing hydration for clear, poreless skin that is perfectly prepped for makeup. In traditional Eastern medicine, Japanese Wild Rose is used to bring the body back into balance, improve circulation and even calm the spirit. The antioxidant-rich fruits of this fragrant blossom can balance skin and diminish the look of pores. Found on the cool hillsides of Japan, Japanese Leopard Lily has been prized for centuries. Used to decorate the streets of Kyoto’s geisha district during the Gion Festival, Japanese Leopard Lily has earned the name “the flower of Kyoto.” We’ve harnessed its special powers to help minimise excess oil production, calm problem skin, and promote turnover of the skin. Hadasei-3 Complex reveals soft, healthy-looking skin. Featuring Uji Green Tea (known to detoxify and help prevent signs of premature ageing), Okinawa Red Algae (rich in polysaccharides, essential for skin water retention and renewal), and Akita Rice (a nourishing moisturiser, rich in essential proteins).

what_it_does: This is next-generation protection, made with 100% mineral-based sunscreen. Professionally inspired treatment helps safeguard the healthy beauty of your skin with a holistic 3-in-1 approach, fighting the visible effects of indoor and outdoor environmental assaults. UVA/UVB Broad Spectrum Defense in a smooth, lightweight fluid. This patent-pending formula, also featuring Tiger Lily Extract, helps fight damage to elastin to support naturally firm, bouncy skin. what_it_is: A sheer, physical sunscreen that delivers powerful broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection for a more youthful-looking complexion.
what_it_does: This daily sunscreen is loaded with potent antioxidants like astaxanthin, grape juice extract and sunflower shoot extract to help defend your skin from free radicals and environmental aggressors, and is formulated without any chemical screens or silicones. Infused with raspberry seed and marula oils, this non-irritating, non-sensitising formula delivers essential moisture and helps minimise the look of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving your skin looking healthy and youthful. Ideal for daily use, it won’t leave any white residue or greasiness, with a lightweight texture that melts into your skin and is virtually invisible.
